title: Strawberry Apple Yogurt Parfait with Honey Cookie Crumble
directions: Make the cookie crumble: In a small skillet or microwave-safe bowl, mix brown sugar, butter, flour or oats, salt, and cinnamon. Heat until the mixture bubbles, then stir until crumbly. Let cool and crisp.
Prep the fruit: Toss diced apple and sliced strawberries with a drizzle of honey. Optionally microwave the apples for 30-45 seconds to soften slightly.
Assemble the parfait: Layer Greek yogurt, fruit, and crumble in a glass or bowl. Repeat layers.
Drizzle with more honey on top.
notes: No-bake layered dessert. Optional add-ons: dash of vanilla or almond extract in the yogurt, lemon zest or juice in the fruit, toasted nuts or granola for crunch. Can also add chocolate chips for a richer version.
